ygData.subject: Cry Havoc!
ygData.msgSnippet: (I don t remember many of the posts from 10 hours ago, so sorry if some of this is wrong, also...Dachande, you can t have one character fire individual shots

Subject: Cry Havoc!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: KSLawdogg@...

(I don't remember many of the posts from 10 hours ago, so sorry if some of 
this is wrong, also...Dachande, you can't have one character fire individual 
shots at over 10 different people, unless it's an automatic weapon.  Also, 
Unitron isn't at the battle, and Double Punch is cloaked, and you posted 
nothing involving trying to find Double Punch, so your shots wouldn't work)

(Also, Kinger, just wondering if you wanted to know, it's Pestilence, not the 
way spelled it)

The Oblitercons/Shockwave/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee:





Dark One barell rolled, evading all shots, and fired off two missiles down in 
the middle of the Four Nightmares.

---

Breakdown transformed to biped mode, grenade launcher in one hand, sonic 
blaster in the other.  He let out a grunt of pain as numerous shots struck 
him in the abdomen.  He fired off a grenade at Nemean Hydra, and fired off a 
sonic blast at Wolveritron.

---

Hiss transformed to biped mode, firing off three fusion blasts at the virus 
infected arrow with great marksmanship before it was even twenty yards near 
the Alliance members, and stumbled from enemy fire.

---

Pyro laughed as shots hit his form, firing off three fire balls at Eclipse, 
two side panels opening up on the front of his tank mode, firing off two 
missiles at the retreating Destructor.

---

Scavenger laughed as shots dented his form, firing off a total of twenty 
armor-piercing rounds from his cannons at Jynx.

---

Demon Wulf laughed out as his armor was struck with weapons fire, leaving 
slight dents.  He raised his sword, the blade firing off, now a missile at 
the middle of the Four Horsemen, five rapid crimson optic blasts lancing out 
at Eclipse.

---

Dark Claw laughed as shots struck into his armored form, now in his attack 
vehicle mode, shaped like a 'T' at best.  He activated his missile launchers, 
firing off two missiles at the middle of the Four Nightmares.

---

Flesh Ripper formed an orb of fire in his left hand, 3 ft X 3 ft, and threw 
it at Nemean Hydra.

---

Double Punch, cloaked, rasied both pinchers, firing one energy-signature 
seeking missile off at the fleeing Destructor, not sure if he was to far 
away, and fired another energy-signature seeking missile from the other 
pincher at Bellum.

---

Bumblebee cursed as shots knocked him back in the air, Injector dodging most 
of the shots, catching a few in the legs.  He looked to Bumblebee, then the 
tree he had seen the weapons fire come from.

Bumblebee raised both stinger missile launchers, firing off two stinger 
missiles from each at the tree, and two optic blasts at the tree Dachande was 
in (four stinger missiles, 2 optic blasts)

---

Injector fired off two stinger missiles from each launcher at the tree 
Dachande was in, followed up by five rapid optic blasts.

---

Manterror let out a yell.  "To face the Manterror is to face defeat!"  He 
raised both arms, firing off a total of four ion disks (two from each arm) 
off.  Two at Eclipse, two at Obitus.

---

Ares swerved his turret, letting loose four purple blasts of deadly laser 
energy off from each cannon attached to his turret.  A total of sixteen 
blasts charged out towards the middle of the Four Nightmares.

---

Sixshot dive bombed, catching a blast that almost tore through his wing.  He 
pulled up, amost losing control, but regained it.  He fired off ten rapid 
blasts of laser energy from the weapons in his nosecone off at Pestilence.

---

Shockwave arrived on scene, flying high in the sky, using his scanners to 
determine the weakest targets.  

KitKat! he thought.  Leader of a ragtag band of Predacons, it shall be 
amusing to crush her.  

He armed his missile launchers and activated his engines to full power, 
blasting off in his space fighter mode after Destructor.  He fired off two 
heat seeking missiles at Destructor, charging up his laser weapons.

(NOTE: Shockwave has no contacts and is pretty much never up-to-date on 
powers in the Neo Beast Wars)
